channel.title: Weapon & Food Glitch
channel.description:
For some reason, if your not holding a weapon, you cant eat. IF you click the food and nothing happens. I was going to try to fix this, but I'm not eve sure where to start. If anybody else solved this problem, please post what you did. It's starting to tick a lot of people off.
Thanks

item.title: Weapon & Food Glitch
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
